API Reference¶

class dual_autodiff.dual.Dual(real: float, dual: float)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class representing a dual number a + bε, where ε² = 0.

Parameters:

  • real (float) -- The real part of the dual number.

  • dual (float) -- The dual part (ε) of the dual number.

arcsin()[source]¶

log(base=2.718281828459045)[source]¶

Compute the logarithm of the dual number.

Parameters:

base (float, optional) -- The logarithmic base. Defaults to e.

Returns:

The logarithm of the dual number.

Return type:

Dual

Raises:

ValueError -- If the real part is non-positive.
